alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion County through 345 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Juniper Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Juniper Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
